resources.string: Agile Planning Poker not found.\n\nTo mirror state between wearable and handheld, you must install the Agile Planning Poker app from Market.
Click here to install the app.
Start Wear Planning Poker on your Wearable
You can mirror the card background color, card text color, current selected deck, current selected card and the card visibility.
To mirror the state between Agile Planning Poker and the wearable device you must start the Wear Planning Poker app in your wearable device.
Using the menu \"Send state to handheld\" to apply Wear Planning Poker state to Agile Planning Poker state.
And using the menu \"Get state from handheld\" to apply Agile Planning Poker state to Wear Planning Poker state.
